title: 2 Како се користи?
description: Овде ћу да објасним шта је.
html:
Step one

Create a new project, using degit:

npx degit "sveltejs/sapper-template#rollup" my-app
cd my-app
npm install # or yarn!
npm run dev

Step two

Go to localhost:3000. Open my-app in your editor. Edit the files in the src/routes directory or add new ones.

Step three

...

Step four

Resist overdone joke formats.

metadata.title: What is Sapper?
metadata.description: Sta je Sapper i koja je razlika u odnosu na Svelte?
